channel.title: Read fully, Beginner programmer help!
channel.description: Hey guys, well im a beginner programmer, and ive been at learning java for the past month and a half from this guy on youtube. This is his first video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl-zzrqQoSE (Im on number 44, so im really not that experienced) and i really understand how programming works. Its just remembering how to code things that i have trouble with. I understand the concept, and understand what ide have to do to get this certain thign to work, its just i cant code it out, since im not that experienced. What i would like, is to join a dev team, as a coder and help out, and code minor stuff. I would probably need an experienced person to help me, but after 1-2months ill definately be somewhat competent, so i can right good code by myself.(Ive tried working on my own source and client, but i cant port forward because my isp wont let me) TY in advance, and also wasnt sure where to put this.

item.title: Read fully, Beginner programmer help!
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

continue by yourself. the wrong people helping you will only result in you have bad practices and/or less elegant code.

  • write/experiment
  • fail
  • rewrite
  • get better

that is a continuous cycle

Read full topic

item.title: Read fully, Beginner programmer help!
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

What’s you’re msn, i’d be glad to take you under my wing.

Read full topic

item.title: Read fully, Beginner programmer help!
item.dc:creator: @kile_392 kile 392
item.description:
@kile_392 wrote:

Hey guys, well im a beginner programmer, and ive been at learning java for the past month and a half from this guy on youtube. This is his first video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl-zzrqQoSE (Im on number 44, so im really not that experienced) and i really understand how programming works. Its just remembering how to code things that i have trouble with. I understand the concept, and understand what ide have to do to get this certain thign to work, its just i cant code it out, since im not that experienced. What i would like, is to join a dev team, as a coder and help out, and code minor stuff. I would probably need an experienced person to help me, but after 1-2months ill definately be somewhat competent, so i can right good code by myself.(Ive tried working on my own source and client, but i cant port forward because my isp wont let me)
TY in advance, and also wasnt sure where to put this.
